report.name: suivi_proposition

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT DISTINCT ca.clibrca clibrca, ca.codcamo || ' - ' || LPAD(lig.codinv,3,'0') ligne, lig.libelle libelle_inv, lig.type || ' - ' || inv.lib_type type_inv, LPAD(lr.codinv,3,'0') || ' - ' || LPAD(lr.codrea,2,'0') lib_type, decode(lr.codrea,null,'vide','ok') test, lr.type_eng type_eng, proj.icpi || ' - '|| proj.ilibel lib_proj, ca.codcamo codcamo, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, lig.annee annee, lig.demande propose_ht, sum(lig.demande*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) propose_htr, sum(lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) budget
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, ligne_realisation lr, proj_info proj, poste p, taux_recup tr, tva t1 WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND lr.codcamo(+)=lig.codcamo AND lr.codinv(+)=lig.codinv AND lr.annee(+)=lig.annee -- AND tr.filcode = ca.filcode --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY inv.codposte, p.lib_poste, ca.codcamo, ca.clibrca , lig.type, lig.codinv , lig.libelle, lr.codrea , lr.codinv , lig.demande, lr.type_eng , inv.lib_type, proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, lig.annee, lig.not_tvarecup, t1.tva, tr.taux

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )
sum ( lig.demande * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select:
SELECT DISTINCT lig.type || ' - ' || inv.lib_type type_inv, ca.codcamo || ' - ' || LPAD(lig.codinv,3,'0') ligne, lig.libelle libelle_inv1, LPAD(lr.codinv,3,'0') || ' - ' || LPAD(lr.codrea,2,'0') lib_type, decode(lr.codrea,null,'vide','ok') test, lr.type_eng type_eng, proj.icpi || ' - '|| proj.ilibel lib_proj, (inv.codposte|| ' - ' || p.lib_poste) poste, lig.annee annee, lig.demande propose_ht, sum( lig.demande*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) propose_htr, sum( lig.notifie*decode(lig.not_tvarecup, null,(1+t1.tva/100*(1-tr.taux/100)) ,1+lig.not_tvarecup/100)) budget
FROM centre_activite ca, ligne_investissement lig, investissements inv, ligne_realisation lr, proj_info proj, poste p, taux_recup tr, tva t1 WHERE --jointures inv.codposte=p.codposte AND ca.codcamo=lig.codcamo AND inv.codtype = lig.type AND lig.icpi=proj.icpi AND lr.codcamo(+)=lig.codcamo AND lr.codinv(+)=lig.codinv AND lr.annee(+)=lig.annee -- -- AND tr.filcode = ca.filcode --AND tr.annee = lig.annee &P_T_WHERE AND t1.datetva =(select max(TVA.datetva) from tva where datetva <= pack_suivi_investissement.cherche_date_exercice) --conditions --AND to_char(lig.annee)=:P_PARAM7 &P_WHERE
GROUP BY inv.codposte, p.lib_poste, lig.type, lig.codinv , lr.codinv , lig.libelle, lr.codrea , ca.codcamo, lig.demande, lr.type_eng , inv.lib_type, proj.icpi, proj.ilibel, lig.annee, lig.not_tvarecup, t1.tva, tr.taux

dataDescriptor.expression: sum ( lig.notifie * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )
sum ( lig.demande * decode ( lig.not_tvarecup , null , ( 1 + t1.tva / 100 * ( 1 - tr.taux / 100 ) ) , 1 + lig.not_tvarecup / 100 ) )
